title: cant play league
body: I'm having problems with my league of legends not working. I open league of legends i click launch and the log in screen loads but does not open, i have tried even as administrator. I have tried uninstalling and re-installing the game countless times. disabling my firewall and still nothing. Ive tried just about everything so pls help.

replies.body: It does seem like something is blocking the patcher from loading, so running as admin is a step in the right direction.  Try every steps specifically in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to troubleshoot.  Let me know if it does the trick!
